description: Call other KBase module methods from within a running app. While a KBase App is running, it can call methods on other apps by starting up separate docker containers, running commands, tracking job results, and keeping a log of everything (which can be used to generate data provenance).
name: KBase Module Subjob Runner
organization: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
tags: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
